name: Scion (Demo)
description:
Created in RPG Maker MV and as a solo dev project, Scion follows the two protagonists Rhys and Finn as they search for answers to Finn's sister's mysterious illness and the world's problems. Explore the world of Tir Abreithe and find the answers that the two seek, meeting multiple pairs of companions in various paths to choose from. 

Using real world cultures as a basis, all in-game cultures try to use alike names for language and lore. Only 3 of 6 cultures are present or mentioned in the demo, leaving much to be seen and experienced on full release.

Note: This is a demo and not representative of the end project.
